title: Baiskeli - Valerie Kimani
description:
I can say for a fact this is a superb album no doubt about it.
It is a mix of slow, mellow and a number of fast-paced tracks covering various sounds. Here, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re definitely going to pick out unique nuances of South African and East Africa (Uganda and Kenyan) music intonations.

And original, vernacular (Kikuyu) tracks like Ã¢â‚¬Å“Ngugi iiÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and Ã¢â‚¬Å“Hoi and HoiÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ are some of the highlights of this album. Bottom line- this is a well crafted album which has the input of some of the best producers, artists and instrumentalists locally and internationally (Kenya, Uganda and South Africa).
